revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "[(Column) 21]:;Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day, drachmas 64, obols 27;;(Mecheir) 13 likewise: ;Horion, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, obols 28;;Anchorimphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Theagenes, son of Theagenes, grandson of Ammonios, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Harsiesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Akoution, son of Heron, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tauris, guard tax, drachmas 8;;Ptollas, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 12;;Heras, brother, with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Agathopous, slave of Thermouthis alias Tpaietis, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Chairemon, grandson of Horos, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 76, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 14:;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas, 8;;Heraklas, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Pammoneouis, son of Anchorimphis, grandson of Pammoneouis, mother Didymarion, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, obols 28;;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Aunes, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Horos, son of Horos, grandson of Horos, mother Taharmothes, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 48, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 15 likewise:;Komon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollautis, drachmas 8;;Sisois, son of Limnaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Patkonnis, grandson of Harobros, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Maron, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thases, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Heron, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Eserempis, drachmas 4;;Didymion, son of Petheus the older, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Paouetis, son of Petheus, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, obols 28;;in total for the day drachmas 84, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 16 likewise:;Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetesouchos, obols 28;;Horos, son of Menandros, grandson of Anchophis, mother Soeris, obols 28;;Nekpheraus, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Nekpheraus, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4, obols 26;;in total for the day drachmas 20, obols 26."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
